title: AMERICAN GODS Season 2 Episode 5 Breakdown & Details You Missed!
author: Think Story
comment: This show doesn't hand hold at all, if it wasn't for your breakdowns I would be extremely lost

The Loa that interacted with Laura and Sweeny tricked them both by transporting the two together in the middle of their sex act in order to force Sweeny and Laura to have sex. It was a trick used to force Sweeny to realize his feelings for Laura weren't all hateful.
American gods and GoT, next week?! Damn, I guess Daddy does love us very much!
The statue is not Jesus, it's saint JUde, patron of lost causes

The sex scene between dead wife and Mad Sweeney also takes us back to that short glimpse of them naked together the time he was teleporting them to the train..and he told Laura to think with her heart or something(I forget)..so maybe they both have feelings for each other...plus the voodoo man asked what she was going to do with her  second chance and she was to pay him with truth..she didn't give an answer it just showed her and Mad Sweeney...which I believe is her truth of what she's going to do when she gets her second shot at life
